articles.title: Russia pounds Ukraine's Donetsk region after seizing Luhansk
articles.description: Russian forces struck targets across Ukraine's eastern Donetsk region on Tuesday, a day after President Vladimir Putin declared victory in the neighbouring province of Luhansk after months of gruelling attritional warfare in which both sides lost many men.

articles.title: After police are shot, Philly mayor says he’ll ‘be happy’ when he’s not mayor anymore
articles.description: Mayor Jim Kenney's comments were made to press outside the hospital where police officers were being treated after being shot while on duty at the city’s Independence Day celebrations Monday night.

articles.title: 3 dead, 7 wounded after shooting at block party in Gary
articles.description: The shooting happened at a block party in Gary just after midnight, according to police.
articles.content:
GARY, Ind. (CBS) – Three people are dead, and seven others are wounded in a mass shooting at a block party in Gary Tuesday just after midnight.

articles.title: Flood-weary residents assess the damage after Sydney's recent deluge
articles.description: Sydney resident Kevin has endured four floods in his home within the last six months. His yard is filled with filthy debris and he points to grime on the walls of his house up to the height of his shoulders caused by the flood waters.
